document_data.name: Ashtara
document_data.mainbody: '''Ashtara''' was an [[asabi]] merchant and slaver in the revived [[Netheril|Netherese]] flying city of [[Undrentide]].
document_data.History:
Ashtara was exploring the ruins of Undrentide when he met [[Drogan Droganson's apprentice]]. He tried to enslave him.
He died during the subsequent fall of the city.
